page.title: 04THE GRAND SHAFT
page.content:
The Grand Shaft consists of three stairways that are built into the cliffs at Snargate Street,Dover.
They were used to get from the barracks at the Citadel to the town centre and the docks.
The shaft was built during the Napoleonic Wars in case of a raid on Dover by the French.If there was a raid the troops could be transferred to the bottom of the cliffs where they could then be deployed to wherever they were needed.
The different stairways were used by the three different classes; one for Ladies and Gentlemen,one for Officers and one for troops.Passes were issued in different colours for each stairway
